name: Alice Holt Forest: Willows Green Trail

ai.summary: Alice Holt Forest's Willows Green Trail is a short, easy woodland walk in the UK. At 1.6 km, the route is suitable for families and beginners, offering a calm stroll through managed mixed woodland with a gentle, well-maintained surface.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained forest paths with compacted earth. Expect shaded sections, occasional tree roots near the trail edges, and occasional gentle changes in grade. The surface is suitable for most footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Please follow all park signs and stay on marked paths. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light layer and water. Be mindful of cyclists on shared trails, and keep dogs under control and on a short leash where required. Pack out any litter and check weather conditions before you go.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or lightweight hiking boots
Map or offline map/app on your phone
Sun protection (sunscreen, hat) in sunny weather
Phone charged and emergency contact info
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) generally offers the best conditions for dry, comfortable walking. The trail is accessible in winter, but can be muddy and less predictable.

seo.title: Willows Green Trail at Alice Holt Forest | 1.6 km Easy Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Willows Green Trail in Alice Holt Forest. This 1.6 km easy, family-friendly walk in the UK features flat, shaded woodland and a calm pace.
